_header: A song to sing I have good right
_description: A macaronic carol of the Nativity — six quatrains (abab) and four-line Latin burden: ‘Laus, honor, virtus, gloria / Et tibi decus Maria’ (repeated)

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
A songe to syng y haue god ryȝt& myrþ to make in
                    þis presens…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…We praye the ȝyf hit be thy wylleMane nobis[cum]
                        domine
